awards.text: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 10 wins & 3 nominations.

fullplot: Set in Ireland, Sharon Curley is a 20 year old living with her parents and many brothers and sisters. When she gets herself pregnant and refuses to name the father, she becomes the talk of the town.

title: The Snapper
